name: Attack Wisely
description: Use light attacks for safe pokes and heavy attacks when enemies are vulnerable or staggered.

name: Manage Stamina
description: Never let your stamina fully deplete. Always keep enough to dodge or block in emergencies.

name: Master Parrying
description: Perfect parry timing stuns enemies and opens them up for devastating counter-attacks.
